channel.title: Peter Villano's Personal Site
channel.description: Recent content on Peter Villano's Personal Site

item.title: About
item.description: Hi I’m Rocky. I enjoy 3D printing, watching animation, and PC gaming. I graduated from the University of Purdue in 2019, majoring in Computer Science, and minoring in Psychology and Mathematics. I am non-binary. My pronouns are they/them.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World! this page already has a title

item.title: Word of the Day
item.description: The word of the day, today and every day, is anisotropic. Anisotropic means different in different directions.
